software.title: Web-Based MRI Analysis Software
software.shortDescription: Advanced medical imaging analysis tool for healthcare professionals
software.longDescription: Our Web-Based MRI Analysis Software is a comprehensive solution for medical professionals, offering state-of-the-art image processing capabilities and intuitive analysis tools. This platform enables efficient diagnosis and research in neuroimaging.

software.title: Comprehensive Breast Cancer Assessment System
software.shortDescription: Multimodal deep learning framework for breast cancer diagnosis
software.longDescription: This project focuses on building a multimodal deep learning framework to improve breast cancer diagnosis by combining image segmentation and clinical data analysis. The model will process mammography images and corresponding patient data to perform segmentation and predict relevant clinical features. This integrative approach aims to enhance diagnostic accuracy and provide a comprehensive assessment for breast cancer evaluation.

software.title: Big-Matrix Academy
software.shortDescription: Comprehensive e-learning platform for AI and Data Science education
software.longDescription: Big-Matrix Academy is an innovative e-learning platform designed to provide high-quality education in Deep Learning, Machine Learning, and Data Science. Our platform offers interactive courses, hands-on projects, and real-world applications to help students master the fundamentals and advanced concepts of AI and data science. With expert-led instruction and practical exercises, we ensure students develop the skills needed for today's tech-driven world.
